News.Title: Vertoz Files Patent Application in India for Dynamic Price Optimization Technology
News.Summary: Vertoz has filed a patent application in India for technology covering dynamic price optimization in real-time bidding. The patent application relates to the company's advertising technology capabilities in programmatic advertising and automated bidding processes.

News.Title: Veritoz Secures Communications Role for XLRI Jamshedpur
News.Summary: Veritoz has secured a communications role for XLRI Jamshedpur. The company will be handling communications responsibilities for the educational institution.

News.Title: Vertoz Reports 16% Growth in Q1 Net Profit to 64 Million Rupees
News.Summary: Vertoz reported quarterly consolidated net profit of 64 million rupees compared to 55 million rupees in the same period last year, representing a year-over-year increase. The company's revenue grew to 705 million rupees from 602 million rupees in the previous year. EBITDA increased to 100 million rupees from 89 million rupees year-over-year. However, EBITDA margin declined slightly to 14.18% from 14.85% in the comparable period.
